name: Connect All Numbers
description:
Connect All Numbers is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Did you know?
Playing puzzle games improves Cognitive Ability, Concentration, Problem Solving Skill and Productivity.

Gameplay ranges from simple and relaxing, to challenging and hard.

How to play
Your path will start from Number 1 in ascending order.
You also must go through all boxes except the locked ones.

Features:
- 600 challenging levels
- Time limited
- Smooth, Simple UI.
- Fun sound effects.
- Clean vector graphics.


Enjoy the game.
